Description: Steaua Bucuresti legendary Romanian club and the 1986 European Cup winner. With a rich history of league titles and a passionate fanbase, Steaua is a sleeping giant waiting to be awakened. Now stuck in the second division due to legal disputes and a club split, managing Steaua offers a unique challenge: rebuilding a historic powerhouse, overcoming off-field turmoil, and leading them back to the top of Romanian football and beyond.
